item.description:
Here's the gameplan... Get to the airport early. Around 4:30... Wash the plane... It needs to look pretty for Saturday's Wings and Wheels show and Young Eagles the following weekend.

Then, using Mother Nature's blow dryer, off to Jaffrey for a quick Lobstah Roll... Fly back, finish getting it cleaned... And maybe even coat her with some wax...

Sounds like a great day coming up for flying and cleaning... Already clean? Come fly anyhow. Wheels off the ground around 5:30! We could go to Barnes instead if we want. AFN wants us gone by 6:30ish. We can decide Wednesday!

No Plane? No Problem. Come down and help. I'm sure I can take someone with me to AFN. Anyone not flown before with me and dare too? I'd love to scare...er....ahm..... have you along...

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Plane Wash and Dry and Lobtsah Rolls, or...
